alert.note: Alert for Concho; Runnels; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact eastern Tom Green, southern Runnels and Concho Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 955 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms over the eastern half of Tom Green County, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Paint Rock, Christoval, Eden, Miles, Lowake, Wall, Grape Creek, Goodfellow Air Force Base, Veribest, Vancourt, Lake Nasworthy, Eola, Rowena, Orient, San Angelo State Park, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Mereta, O.c. Fisher Reservoir and Millersview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
